publishedfiledetails.title: eco's Stable Structures and Decor
publishedfiledetails.description:
[h1][b]MOD ID: 1091147617[/b][/h1]

[b]Craft rustic structures, old west decor, and storage for your stable, ranch, barn, western towns, or equestrian base![/b]

[h1][b]100% Stackable mod.[/b][/h1] 

[img=https://s10.postimg.cc/rhi1e7mxl/EDImportant.png][/img]

[h1][b]When using a structure mod ALWAYS make sure to check that the mod folder and the .mod file are correctly installed after updating your server or single player game. If your server or SP game starts without a sturcture mod installed correctly you could lose all of those structure pieces. In that case you would need to rollback your save file. All of my mods are tested on my own server before updates become public.[/b][/h1] 

[b]If you need help with a rollback you can find a tutorial here: [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H7uNetxbR7I]ARK Rollback Tutorial[/url] [/b]


[img=https://s13.postimg.cc/l1y536fpz/TK1.png][/img]

[h1]All items can be picked up. (Hold use key to pick up.)
Engram cost: 0
Level needed to learn engram: 1
All items have HP[/h1]

[url=http://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/1091147617/1470840994956679285/][img]https://s9.postimg.cc/wyu164ofj/Admin_TK.png[/img][/url] [url=http://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/670764308/217691032441409625/][img]https://s10.postimg.cc/clji6o195/Mod_Tek.png[/img][/url] [url=http://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/1091147617/1470840994956695116/][img]https://s10.postimg.cc/pof4q0ri1/Bug_Reports.png[/img][/url]

[url=http://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/1091147617/1470840994956700741/][img]https://s9.postimg.cc/fd528jszz/FAQs.png[/img][/url]

[img=https://s9.postimg.cc/l069n9pcf/EDButton2.png][/img]

[h1][b]Mod includes:[/b][/h1]

[b]Saddle Rack (Crafting Table)[/b]

2 Types of Barrels (Storage and for Barrel Racing)
4 Ribbons
3 Trophies
7 Types of Storage
10 Numbered Logs for Jumps
Rustic Chair
Rustic Tables
2 Rustic Beds (Can be dyed)
Wall Name Plate (Decorative Wall Sign)
Podium (Numbered for Contest Winners)
Hay Bedding (Can be raised or lowered for different floor heights)
4 Jumps
7 Styles of Wall Tack (Storage)
Weathervanes
Feeding Trough (Extended Spoiler Timer)
2 Types of Pathways with Stairs and Corners
Rope and Wood Railings
[h1][b]110+ Structure Pieces to build your own stables![/b][/h1] 
[b](Structures are Low Poly, Scorched Earth Friendly, Paintable, and Texture Swapping)[/b]



[img=https://s2.postimg.cc/ty07ng2t5/lowpoly.png][/img]


[img=https://s9.postimg.cc/fh780wfbz/EDse_Poly_Vert2.png][/img]


[h1] [b]By having low poly building pieces you can create large or multiple structures with less load put on your client or server. [/b][/h1]

The number of polys used to create a mesh is key in optimization. The less triangles that there are, the less the GPU has to process each frame. It will also improve performance due to physics collisions and calculations. Textures can help provide a higher quality looking piece without adding to the poly count.

[h1][b]Texture Swapping![/b][/h1]

Hold E on 50+ Structure Pieces to choose been Wood or Brick textures. Painted pieces can now also have the dye removed by Holding E and selecting the menu option.

[url=http://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/1091147617/1470840994956719712/][img]https://s3.postimg.cc/s2hfjw3vn/disablecollision.png[/img][/url]


[h1][b]To build into the terrain you will need to disable collision check in your server game.ini or in your singleplayer options.[/b][/h1]

For easy instructions on how to do this follow this [url=http://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/1091147617/1470840994956719712/]No Collision Tutorial[/url]


[img=https://s10.postimg.cc/9pkl96dnt/Stable_Snap_Points.png][/img]



[url=https://www.patreon.com/ecoModsGames][img]https://s10.postimg.cc/5ibmqtqm1/patreon.png[/img][/url]

[url=https://discord.gg/8C3GUFt][img]https://s10.postimg.cc/c5men4b6x/Discord.png[/img][/url]

[url=https://logicservers.com/?promo=Eco][img]https://s22.postimg.cc/ehjqv7s7l/logicservers-banner.png[/img][/url]

Server Hosting Provided by [url=https://logicservers.com/?promo=Eco]LogicServers[/url]
[b]Use promo code eco for 20% off[/b]
I receive NO payment from this company I just really like them :)


[img=https://s10.postimg.cc/a5hosxe2h/TKInstall.png][/img]

[h1][b]Having issues installing or updating a mod?[/b][/h1]
[url=https://www.bluefangsolutions.com/adding-mods-to-your-ark-game-server/]Installing/Updating Mods Tutorial[/url] - Text instructions
[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h6MmSoZdRA8]Installing/Updating Mods Tutorial[/url] - Video instructions

[h1][b]MOD ID: 1091147617[/b][/h1]

[h1][b]Missing items?[/b][/h1]
If you updated the mod and are missing items then your install is probably corrupt. You must follow the instructions [b][u]specifically[/u][/b] for your server host.

[h1][b]Can't place items or find the Crafting Table engram?[/b][/h1]
If you can't place an item from this mod then your server probably hasn't updated with the latest version. If you can't find the engram make sure the mod is copied over to the server completely and the mod ID is listed under active mods. 

[img=https://s10.postimg.cc/fi6j6jme1/TKMods.png][/img]
